AD_AlarmUsedReaction_Guard_003.synopsis: The Checkpoint Guard heard the player playing a song. The goblins is dancing.

AD_WarPaint_007.synopsis: One of the guards at the Spider Pit comments on the War Paint.

AD_BackupGroupDialog.synopsis:
Backup goblins near the mountain pass. A little bit drunk. They are offering various toasts.

Rhaal'tuuch = rawl-TOOSH, long-O like soon, not short-O like took. Tuuch = toosh!

AD_WarPaint_002.synopsis: One of the goblins maliciously comments on the fact that player has worg poop on their face.

AD_CapturedGoblinRunsAway.synopsis: Sazza went back to camp, only ro realize everyone has been slaughtered. She runs off after this.

AD_Guard_004_Backup.synopsis: One of the checkpoint guards complains about the backup goblins "probably drinking and playing dice"

AD_AlarmUsedReaction_Guard_001.synopsis: The player used the alarm drum. Depending on who the player is and how they performed, the goblins around the alarm will either be impressed, neutral, or willing to fight.

AD_CapturedGoblinWithGuard.synopsis: If the Captured goblin is at the checkpoint then the main guard uses this dialog instead of the default one (GOB_Checkpoint_AD_GuardsConversation). After the CG leaves the checkpoint the guard returns to his default dialog.A back-and-forth between enemies. Sazza and Olak detest each other.

AD_AlarmUsedReaction_Guard_005.synopsis: The Checkpoint Guard heard the player playing a song. The goblins is dancing.

AD_Guard003_AlarmComment.synopsis: Goblin in combat preparing to go hit an alarm. Might find it broken and useless.

AD_WarPaint_008.synopsis: One of the beastmasters in the Worg Pens comments on the fact the player has worg dung on their face

AD_Guard_003_Boulder.synopsis: One of the checkpoint guards checks the "defense system" at the checkpoint - boulder which rolls down if you destroy the rope that is holding it.

AD_BackupArrivedToParty.synopsis: The backup goblins heard someone using the drum and rushed to the checkpoint only to realise that there is no enemy.

AD_WarPaint_001.synopsis: One of the goblins maliciously comments on the fact that player has worg poop on their face.

AD_CapturedGoblinLeadingWay.synopsis: She's leading you up to a goblin checkpoint with confidence.

AD_BackupAnnoyed.synopsis: The backup goblins were summoned from their positions to the checkpoint by false alarms two times. They are annoyed and won't go to the checkpoint anymore.

AD_Worg_002.synopsis: Chatter for Small Klaw as she's guarding the checkpoint

AD_Guard004_AlarmComment.synopsis: A goblin at a checkpoint outside the goblin camp runs to a war drum - 'the alarm' mentioned in the dialogue - when combat begins

AD_Guard005_AlarmComment.synopsis: Combat dialogue, goblin going for the alarm.

AD_Guard_005_Party.synopsis: One of the checkpoint guards complains about missing the party.

AD_AlarmUsedReaction_Guard_004.synopsis: The Checkpoint Guard heard the player playing a song. The goblins is dancing.

AD_Guard002_AlarmComment.synopsis: Goblin is making to hit the alarm to warn the camp that there are intruders. This dialogue plays during combat

AD_Guard001_AlarmComment.synopsis: Guards are going to sound the alarm during battle.

AD_AlarmUsedReaction_Guard_002.synopsis: The Checkpoint Guard heard the player playing a song. The goblins is dancing.

AD_WarPaint_005.synopsis: One of the goblins that is being branded comments on the fact the player has worg dung on their face.

AD_WarPaint_003.synopsis: One of the goblins maliciously comments on the fact that player has worg poop on their face.

AD_CapturedGoblinGivingAccess.synopsis: If there's no leader at the checkpoint, Sazza just blows past the guards with the player in tow.

AD_GuardsConversation.synopsis: This is the conversation that the guards have between themselves at the checkpoint. Olak is gruff and sick of his companions. His companion is chatty and is annoying the shit out of Olak.

AD_Guard001_WorgDeath.synopsis: The main guard at the goblin checkpoint comments on the death of his worg in combat. Sneering.

AD_WarPaint_004.synopsis: One of the guards at the entrance in the inner part of the Goblin Camp (Shar Temple) comments on the fact that the player has worg dung on their face

AD_WarPaint_006.synopsis: One of the torturers comments on the War Paint.

AD_Guard_004_Worg.synopsis: One of the checkpoint guards talks to a worg

AD_AlarmUsedReaction_Guard_003_0.speaker: Tracker Bal
AD_AlarmUsedReaction_Guard_003_0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Dancing to the tune of the alarm drumNodeContext: He's into the song, dancing, enthusiastic

AD_WarPaint_007_0.speaker: Warrior Bez
AD_WarPaint_007_0.text: Feh, is that grunny on your face?!

AD_BackupGroupDialog_4.speaker: Warlock Tud
AD_BackupGroupDialog_4.text: You got it. Blessed be the drow!

AD_BackupGroupDialog_5.speaker: Devout Wasp
AD_BackupGroupDialog_5.context: CinematicNodeContext: Toasting. Basically the goblin version of "cheers!"NodeContext: Toasting. Basically the goblin version of "cheers!" Tuuch = TOOSH!

AD_BackupGroupDialog_2.speaker: Sharp-Eye Sluck
AD_BackupGroupDialog_2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Toasting. Basically the goblin version of "cheers!"NodeContext: Rhaal'tuuch = rawl-TOOSH! Tuuch = TOOSH! Toasting. Basically the goblin version of "cheers!"

AD_BackupGroupDialog_9.speaker: Warlock Tud
AD_BackupGroupDialog_9.context: CinematicNodeContext: Toasting. Basically the goblin version of "cheers!"NodeContext: Toasting. Basically the goblin version of "cheers!" Tuuch = TOOSH!

AD_BackupGroupDialog_3.speaker: Devout Wasp
AD_BackupGroupDialog_3.context: NodeContext: (Gut is the name of the priestess)

AD_BackupGroupDialog_8.speaker: Sharp-Eye Sluck
AD_BackupGroupDialog_8.text: Why the hell not - to Priestess Gut!
AD_BackupGroupDialog_8.context: NodeContext: (Gut is the name of the priestess)

AD_BackupGroupDialog_1.speaker: Warlock Tud
AD_BackupGroupDialog_1.context: NodeContext: (Gut is the name of the priestess)

AD_WarPaint_002_0.speaker: Tracker Bal
AD_WarPaint_002_0.text: What a stunner you are, mate!

AD_CapturedGoblinRunsAway_0.speaker: Sazza
AD_CapturedGoblinRunsAway_0.text: This ain't good. This ain't good at all!
AD_CapturedGoblinRunsAway_0.context: NodeContext: Fearful and anxious, ready to flee.

AD_Guard_004_Backup_1.speaker: Tracker Rindle
AD_Guard_004_Backup_1.text: Where's the rest of the lads at?

AD_Guard_004_Backup_2.speaker: Tracker Rindle
AD_Guard_004_Backup_2.text: Prolly gettin' curled out their cranks.

AD_AlarmUsedReaction_Guard_001_0.speaker: Sentinel Olak
AD_AlarmUsedReaction_Guard_001_0.text: This idiot wants to fight, lads!

AD_CapturedGoblinWithGuard_3.speaker: Sentinel Olak
AD_CapturedGoblinWithGuard_3.context: NodeContext: like 'well, well, well.' Not friendly.

AD_CapturedGoblinWithGuard_4.speaker: Sazza
AD_CapturedGoblinWithGuard_4.text: Don't get cute with me, you cabbage!

AD_CapturedGoblinWithGuard_5.speaker: Sentinel Olak
AD_CapturedGoblinWithGuard_5.context: NodeContext: Sarcastic, this is a back-and-forth between enemies.

AD_Guard003_AlarmComment_1.speaker: Tracker Bal
AD_Guard003_AlarmComment_1.text: Gotta warn the others. I'll hit the drum!

AD_BackupArrivedToParty_1.speaker: Sharp-Eye Sluck
AD_BackupArrivedToParty_1.text: You hit the alarm, didn't ya? Who we after?

AD_BackupArrivedToParty_3.speaker: Sentinel Olak
AD_BackupArrivedToParty_3.text: No alarm. just a bit o' music. Scram.

AD_BackupArrivedToParty_0.speaker: Sentinel Olak
AD_BackupArrivedToParty_0.text: True Soul wanted to, erm, practice. You can scram.
AD_BackupArrivedToParty_0.context: InternalNodeContext: The player might not be presentNodeContext: Player got goblin's favor but has been messing with their alarm system. Goblin has to allow player to do it.

AD_BackupArrivedToParty_5.speaker: Sharp-Eye Sluck
AD_BackupArrivedToParty_5.text: The rat up and left. I'll call ya if the vermin comes back.
AD_BackupArrivedToParty_5.context: NodeContext: Low menace and hostility. The player (the 'Rat') fled

AD_BackupArrivedToParty_2.speaker: Sharp-Eye Sluck
AD_BackupArrivedToParty_2.text: See what happens when you really need help, ye nasty ghukraks.
AD_BackupArrivedToParty_2.context: InternalNodeContext: Annoyed that they had to run the second to the checkpoint for nothing. Will return to his position and not respond to the alarm anymoreNodeContext: Annoyed that they had to run the second to the checkpoint for nothing. Will return to his position and not respond to the alarm anymore. GOOK-raks.

AD_WarPaint_001_0.speaker: Devout Wasp
AD_WarPaint_001_0.text: Ha! Olak got you wearin' our colours, did he?

AD_CapturedGoblinLeadingWay_0.speaker: Sazza
AD_CapturedGoblinLeadingWay_0.text: C'mon - I'll tell the guards what's wot.
AD_CapturedGoblinLeadingWay_0.context: NodeContext: Brash, confident, friendly to you.

AD_BackupAnnoyed_0.speaker: Sharp-Eye Sluck
AD_BackupAnnoyed_0.context: InternalNodeContext: Alarm was raised, but is very annoyed that all previous times it was just the player playing the drum and no real fight. Won't go to the checkpoint.

AD_Guard004_AlarmComment_0.speaker: Tracker Rindle
AD_Guard004_AlarmComment_0.text: Cover me - I'll get the alarm!
AD_Guard004_AlarmComment_0.context: NodeContext: alarmed - shouting to allies as combat begins

AD_Guard004_AlarmComment_1.speaker: Tracker Rindle
AD_Guard004_AlarmComment_1.text: Someone's gone an' broke the alarm!

AD_Guard005_AlarmComment_0.speaker: Sharp-Eye Snurd
AD_Guard005_AlarmComment_0.text: Cover me - I'm goin' for the alarm!

AD_Guard_005_Party_0.speaker: Sharp-Eye Snurd
AD_Guard_005_Party_0.text: What're they doin' over there? Chasin' bird?

AD_Guard_005_Party_1.speaker: Sharp-Eye Snurd
AD_Guard_005_Party_1.text: Little blue beetle in my stew...

AD_Guard002_AlarmComment_0.speaker: Warrior Puce
AD_Guard002_AlarmComment_0.context: NodeContext: Goblin is making to hit the alarm to warn the camp that there are intruders. This dialogue plays during combat

AD_Guard001_AlarmComment_1.speaker: Sentinel Olak
AD_Guard001_AlarmComment_1.text: When th' lashers hear this, they'll cut you down flat.

AD_WarPaint_005_0.speaker: Warlock Greez
AD_WarPaint_005_0.text: Embarrassin' yourself before the Absolute with that muck on your mug.

AD_WarPaint_003_0.speaker: Four
AD_WarPaint_003_0.text: Look at that face! That's disgusting!

AD_CapturedGoblinGivingAccess_0.speaker: Sazza
AD_CapturedGoblinGivingAccess_0.text: Move over, boot-lickers! We're comin' through.

AD_GuardsConversation_0.speaker: Warrior Puce
AD_GuardsConversation_0.text: Can't. Caught fleas from the bloody worgs.

AD_GuardsConversation_15.speaker: Sentinel Olak
AD_GuardsConversation_15.text: More likely you gave them fleas, you filthy bugger.

AD_GuardsConversation_5.speaker: Warrior Puce
AD_GuardsConversation_5.text: Next time, Grib'll be on guard duty, right, boss?

AD_GuardsConversation_3.speaker: Sentinel Olak
AD_GuardsConversation_3.text: Grib couldn't guard his nose from his fingers.

AD_GuardsConversation_7.speaker: Warrior Puce
AD_GuardsConversation_7.text: How much longer we gotta stay out here, boss?

AD_GuardsConversation_9.speaker: Warrior Puce
AD_GuardsConversation_9.text: We're gonna miss out on all the drinkin'.

AD_GuardsConversation_8.speaker: Sentinel Olak
AD_GuardsConversation_8.text: Shut it. We got a job to do.

AD_GuardsConversation_12.speaker: Warrior Puce
AD_GuardsConversation_12.text: They could at least send some of that booze our way.

AD_GuardsConversation_6.speaker: Sentinel Olak
AD_GuardsConversation_6.text: You'd be even less use to me drunk.

AD_GuardsConversation_13.speaker: Sentinel Olak
AD_GuardsConversation_13.text: Just shut up and keep your eyes peeled.

AD_Guard001_WorgDeath_0.speaker: Sentinel Olak
AD_Guard001_WorgDeath_0.context: NodeContext: Klaw has died in combat. Olak is not nice to her dog and blames her.

AD_WarPaint_004_0.speaker: Warrior Nrog
AD_WarPaint_004_0.text: You smell like an old hole.

AD_WarPaint_006_0.speaker: Lookout Grush
AD_WarPaint_006_0.text: Phew, you smell like a crusty mud-hole.

AD_Guard_004_Worg_0.speaker: Tracker Rindle
AD_Guard_004_Worg_0.text: You dead, Klaw? Or was you Small Klaw?

AD_Guard_004_Worg_1.speaker: Tracker Rindle
AD_Guard_004_Worg_1.text: These big dopes could guard the place themselves. Let us off the hook.
